dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description: libraptor2 for parsing and serializing RDF syntaxes
dependencies.name: raptor2

dependencies.description:
Rasqal is a free software / Open Source C library that handles Resource
Description Framework (RDF) query language syntaxes, query construction
and execution of queries returning results as bindings, boolean, RDF
graphs/triples or syntaxes.
dependencies.name: rasqal

dependent_to.description: Redland Language Bindings for language APIs to Redland
dependent_to.name: redland-bindings

description: Redland RDF Library - librdf providing the RDF API and triple stores
name: redland

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
